name: never-melt-ice
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Ice moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Ice-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A hold item that raises the power of ICE-type moves.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises the power of ICE-type moves.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. A piece of ice that repels heat and boosts ICE-type moves.
